level.heading: Title of institution not to imply official connection with government of United States or District of Columbia.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 4004(b)(4) of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 29A-615.

Law 7-142, the "Educational Institution Licensure Commission Institution Title Amendment Act of 1988," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-253, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 14, 1988, and June 28, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 30, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7- 194 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29A-101.01.
